actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-685.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of a Joint Resolution relating to the February 1, 1986 sequestration order of the President.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of a joint resolution ratifying and affirming as law the February 1, 1986, sequestration order of the President issued under the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of a Joint Resolution relating to the February 1, 1986 sequestration order of the President.
